ARABIC: وَإِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّى خَٰلِقٌۢ بَشَرًا مِّن صَلْصَٰلٍ مِّنْ حَمَإٍ مَّسْنُونٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When your Lord said to the angels, 'I am creating a human being out of dried clay formed from fetid black
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But when your Lord said to the angels: "I am verily going to create a human being from fermented clay dried tingling hard;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Recall when your Lord said to the angels: "I will indeed bring into being a human being out of dry ringing clay wrought from black mud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When your Lord said to the angels, "I will create the human being out of pure mud-moulded clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And recall when your Lord said to the angels, “I will create man from sounding clay made out of black smelly mud.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And (remember) when your Lord said to the angels: "I am going to create a man (Adam) from dried (sounding) clay of altered mud. "
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when your Lord said to the angels: Surely I am going to create a mortal of the essence of black mud fashioned in shape.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And when thy Lord said to the angels, 'See, I am creating a mortal of a clay of mud moulded.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And (remember) when thy Lord said unto the angels: Lo! I am creating a mortal out of potter's clay of black mud altered,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Your Lord said to the angels, "I am about to bring into being a man wrought from mud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And recall what time thy Lord said unto the angels: verily I am about to createa man from ringing clay of loam moulded.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When your Lord said to the angels, ‘Indeed I am going to create a human out of a dry clay [drawn] from an aging mud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Behold! thy Lord said to the angels: "I am about to create man, from sounding clay from mud moulded into shape;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And (remember) when your Lord said to the angels: "I am going to create a man (Adam) from sounding clay of altered black smooth mud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When your Lord said to the angels: 'See, I am creating a mortal from clay of molded mud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Your Lord said to the angels, “I am creating a human being from clay, from molded mud.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [mention, O Muhammad], when your Lord said to the angels, "I will create a human being out of clay from an altered black mud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:28] And, mention, when your Lord said to the angels, ‘Indeed I am going to create a mortal out of a dry clay [drawn] from a malleable mud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And (remember) when thy Lord said unto the angels) who were on the earth, there were 10,000 of them: (Lo! I am creating a mortal out of potter's clay of black mud altered) of stinking mud.
